creditline: Gift of Michael and Rosalyn Baker
description: Head-and-shoulders photograph of Civil Rights leader Stokely Carmichael (Kwame Ture), with his left fist raised in the Black Power salute; with text of anti-war chant printed in black block letters.
inscription: Text printed as part of compostion: HELL NO! / WE WON\'T GO!
provenance: Michael and Rosalyn Baker, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2003.
title: Hell no! We won't go! (Stokely Carmichael)
